channel.title: Wildy level glitch
channel.description: well i cant seem to find out whats wrong, if you get out of wildy, the wildy level decreses and goes into the negatives. heres a pic [IMG]http://i236.photobucket.com/albums/ff106/xxx123xxx_2007/wildylvlglitch.jpg[/img]

item.title: Wildy level glitch
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

is this it rich?

public int WildyLevel = 0;
public int leftwild = 0;
public boolean InWildrange = false;
public void WriteWildyLevel()
{
checkwildy2();
int oldlevel = WildyLevel;
WildyLevel = (((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1);
if(inwildy2 && WildyLevel != oldlevel)
{
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("Level: "+WildyLevel, 199);
leftwild = 1;
}
else if(!inwildy2 && leftwild == 1)
{

item.title: Wildy level glitch
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Remove the wilderness sign when you leave the wilderness, and also stop processing the interface. You can make it update the string to tell the Wilderness level youâ€™re in by editing the player movement method.
